com.atakmap.android.navigation.views.buttons

Class NavButtonDrawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
      • com.atakmap.android.navigation.views.buttons.NavButtonDrawable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback

    public class NavButtonDrawable
extends android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
implements android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback
    Drawable icon used for NavButton and other nav-related icons Supports dynamic shadow below the icon
